name: MacKinnon
description: The base for the drink is Drambuie, the Scottish herbal honey-and-whisky liqueur, but before you write it off as too sweet, look at the citrus and soda--that will tone down the sugar a few notches. Plus, there's a slider of rum to help level out flavor, and to bring the horsepower up to the necessary level.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine everything except club soda in a cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Shake well for 10 seconds and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Top with chilled club soda.
